ygData.subject: Re: Sublime
ygData.msgSnippet: The three former Autobots, Firedrill, Cliffjumper and Beachcomber exited the Element, and stood a bit off from the rest of the Maximals who were celebrating.

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The three former Autobots, Firedrill, Cliffjumper and Beachcomber exited
the Element, and stood a bit off from the rest of the Maximals who were
celebrating. "Why aren't we over there joining in?" Asked Firedrill with
innocence. "Because these guys dont know what a war is," Replied
Cliffjumper harshly, "They think theyve won, they dont realize whatever
reason Megatron pulled out, it wasnt because he lost, its because he had
nothing to gain. I mean, they arent exactly a threatening group" He
said, pointing at them sarcastically. Beachcomber watched this with
interest. He had served the original Autobots with Cliffjumper, and
understood where he was coming from. Even thought the Autobots werent
warriors at the time, they still acted more professionally. He almost
understood why Cliffjumper was so discusted with the higher ups of the
Maximals. They all stood and looked at the larger group of Maximals.
